title: Separate Constants and Variables on Either Side of the Equation
text: We must first simplify each side of the equation to get $$2m-8+3=-1$$.

title: Simplify
text: Simplify the left hand side to $$2m-5=-1$$.

title: Simplify
text: Organize the constant to the same side to obtain $$2m=4$$.

title: Division
text: We must make the coefficient of the variable equal to $$1$$, so we divide by $$2$$ on both sides to get $$m=2$$.
